snippet: The Morgan Library & Museum offers exhibitions of Renaissance manuscript illuminations by the Claude Master and Romantic landscapes from Britain and Germany.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews exhibits Miracles in Miniature: The Art of the Master of Claude de France and A Dialogue With Nature: Romantic Landscapes From Britain and Germany at Morgan Library & Museum.
lead_paragraph: The Morgan Library & Museum offers exhibitions of Renaissance manuscript illuminations by the Claude Master and Romantic landscapes from Britain and Germany.

headline.seo: Religious Miniature and Nature Drawings at the Morgan
headline.main: Heaven and Earth, Sized to Grasp
headline.print_headline: Heaven and Earth, Sized to Grasp
